overview:
Web Agency and TV and Film Production

MagmaWave’s work is across platforms, but can be divided into two main sectors. web and film.

It has an active web agency, with a focus at providing multi language web communications in Italy. It creates sites for SME and Large enterprises “chiavi in mano” with keys in the hand for the client to add or change their own content. MagmaWave also provides a full service for larger clients who wish to have a web agency do the driving. They are involved in a startup project, Paginone, that is a client centric simple platform for SME.

MagmaWave film has television and film projects in development, with an emphasis on Italian related product for worldwide distribution. MagmaWave’s history in production dates back to the early web series “Late Nite Mash” and has continued with industrial video and “Making of” documentaries for major films.
